name: Helper Matcher Slack Bot
description: A Slack bot that matches team members who need help with those who have the right skills using AI embeddings and vector similarity search.

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Slack Bot User OAuth Token (starts with xoxb-)

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for generating embeddings

ADMIN_USER_ID.description: Slack User ID for admin notifications

scripts.postdeploy: npm run setup-db && npm run seed-skills -- seed-sample
